subject: Wild Cards RPG
event: Not everyone who reads my Live Journal reads the news page on my website, I know, and vice versa. Many read both, however, so I'll just briefly mention that Green Ronin has released its new Wild Cards role-playing game. The campaign setting book, lavishly illustrated in full color, was written by John Jos. Miller, and should be available soon at a game store near you. It's a great resource for any Wild Cards fan, even if you don't game. For more details, check out my news page.
